snippet: A student who law enforcement officials said wanted to confront a teacher shot and wounded another student, and then died of an apparently self-inflicted gunshot.
abstract: Karl H Pierson, student at Arapahoe High School in Centennial, Colo, carries shotgun into school to confront a teacher, seriously wounds one student and then dies, apparently of self-inflicted gunshot wound; officials say teacher had slipped away.

byline.contributor: Dan Frosch contributed reporting from Denver.

lead_paragraph: A student who law enforcement officials said wanted to confront a teacher shot and wounded another student, and then died of an apparently self-inflicted gunshot.

headline.main: Assailant Dead After Shooting at Colorado School
headline.print_headline: Assailant Dead After Shooting a Fellow Student at a Colorado School
